title: Marketplace Roundtable #9: Healing The World One Biotech Investment At A Time With Jerome Verony
description: Biotech specialist  Jerome Verony of Second-Level Investing sits down with Seeking Alpha's Jonathan Liss for a wide-ranging conversation on investing in the sector and all that requires. In the second half of the show, Jerome shares his current top biotech investing ideas.
